00023 SVec2::SVec2( const MVec2& v )
00024 : x( v.GetX() )
00025 , y( v.GetY() )
00026 {
00027 
00028 }

00030 //----------------------------------------------------------
00031 float
00032 SVec2::Normalize()
00033 {
00035         float mag = Mag();
00036         B_ASSERT( mag > 0.0001f );
00037 
00039         float invM = 1.0f / mag;
00040         x *= invM;
00041         y *= invM;
00042 
00044         return mag;
00045 }
00046 
00047 //----------------------------------------------------------
00048 SVec2
00049 SVec2::Normalized() const
00050 {
00052         float mag = Mag();
00053         B_ASSERT( mag > 0.0001f );
00054 
00056         float invM = 1.0f / mag;
00057 
00059         return SVec2( x * invM, y * invM );
00060 }
00061 
00062 //----------------------------------------------------------
00063 float
00064 SVec2::InvMag() const
00065 {
00066         float m = Mag();
00067         B_ASSERT( m > 0.0001f );
00068         return ( 1.0f / m );
00069 }
00070 
00071 //----------------------------------------------------------
00072 float
00073 SVec2::Dist( const SVec2& v ) const
00074 {
00075         return Sqrt( DistSqr( v ) );
00076 }
00077 
00078 //----------------------------------------------------------
00079 float
00080 SVec2::DistSqr( const SVec2& v ) const
00081 {
00082         float tx = x - v.x;
00083         float ty = y - v.y;
00084         return tx*tx + ty*ty;
00085 }
00086 
00087 //----------------------------------------------------------
00088 SVec2&
00089 SVec2::operator = ( const MVec2& v )
00090 {
00091         x = v.GetX();
00092         y = v.GetY();
00093         return *this;
00094 }
00095 
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------
00097 bool
00098 SVec2::operator == ( const SVec2& v ) const
00099 {
00100         return ( x == v.x && y == v.y );
00101 }
00102 
00103 //----------------------------------------------------------
00104 bool
00105 SVec2::operator != ( const SVec2& v ) const
00106 {
00107         return ( x != v.x || y != v.y );
00108 }

00208 //----------------------------------------------------------
00209 unsigned char
00210 SByteVec3::ClampValue( float v )
00211 {
00212         float temp = Clamp( v * 0.5f + 0.5f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
00213         return ( unsigned char )( temp * 254.0f );
00214 }
00215 
00216 //----------------------------------------------------------
00217 float
00218 SByteVec3::ExpandValue( unsigned char v )
00219 {
00220         return ( ( float( v ) / 254.0f ) * 2.0f ) - 1.0f;
00221 }

00253 //----------------------------------------------------------
00254 STriangle::STriangle( const SVec3& pt0, const SVec3& pt1, const SVec3& pt2 )
00255 : pt0( pt0 )
00256 , pt1( pt1 )
00257 , pt2( pt2 )
00258 {
00259 
00260 }
00261 
00262 //----------------------------------------------------------
00263 bool
00264 STriangle::IsDegenerate()
00265 {
00266         return  ( pt0 == pt1 ) || ( pt1 == pt2 ) || ( pt2 == pt0 );
00267 }
00268 
00269 //----------------------------------------------------------
00270 bool
00271 STriangle::IsDegenerate( float epsilon )
00272 {
00274         return  ( Abs( ( MVec3( pt0 ) - pt1 ).AbsMax() ) < epsilon ) ||
00275                         ( Abs( ( MVec3( pt1 ) - pt2 ).AbsMax() ) < epsilon ) ||
00276                         ( Abs( ( MVec3( pt2 ) - pt0 ).AbsMax() ) < epsilon );
00277 }
